node.doctext:
Portland, Oregon Conspiratorial Board.

We're not against you, we're against what you're for.

(and we've got it [PDXC|going on].)
[Head West! Colonize an already-inhabited place!|COLUMBUS DAY PARTY, suckas! It's in October.] Every year? probably. yeah. until we draw you all in.
node.title: PDXCB
